ThingDef.label: Talons of the Emperor armor workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench for assembling the armor of the Talons of the Emperor. \n\nThe working of auramite is a painstaking process, only to be trusted to the greatest artificers. But if made well, the resulting armor can weather assault that would reduce mere ceramite to dust.
